implementation_output.changes_summary: AC-9.1: Modified _check_port_available() to call sys.exit(48) instead of raising RuntimeError on EADDRINUSE, added loguru error logging. AC-9.2: Added security warning in __main__ block for non-localhost binding addresses (0.0.0.0, etc). AC-9.3: Enriched health_tool() response with 'version' from __version__ and 'uptime' computed from server_start_time. Updated tests for all three acceptance criteria.

results.details: Modified _check_port_available() to use sys.exit(48) on OSError - verified via test_port_already_in_use and test_port_in_use_logs_error
Added security warning for non-localhost binding - verified via test_non_localhost_warning and test_localhost_no_warning
Health tool enrichment with version and uptime - verified via test_health_tool_wrapper
